label: Disagree button
description: Best in class, the disagree action is explicit and transparent. This notice is compliant with most privacy laws worldwide such as GDPR, LGPD or PDPA.

label: Link + Close option
description: User has the option to refuse, either by clicking on the close button or by selecting "Continue without agreeing".

label: Close = disagree
description: Format recommended in 2021 by the Italian DPA. Closing the banner equals disagreeing.

label: Continue without agreeing link
description: Format recommended by the French DPA (CNIL) in 2020. The text "Continue without agreeing" equals refusing trackers & cookies.

label: No disagree action
description: First widespread consent notice format, slowly being banned because of its lack of transparency.
